alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:42PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Kimball and southeastern Laramie Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 242 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gun Barrel to near Carpenter to 10 miles northeast of Rockport. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluffs, Burns, Hillsdale and Carpenter. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 378 and 402. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
